message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $115.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $100 for it.
I understand your position, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $107?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $98 for the product.
